errors.tenant_not_specified: Organization not specified. Please contact support.

errors.invalid_refresh_token: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.unauthorized: You must be signed in to access this resource.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.tenant_slug_exists: An organization with this identifier already exists.
errors.unique_violation: A record with this information already exists.
errors.foreign_key_violation: This record is referenced by other data and cannot be modified.

errors.validation_error: The submitted data is invalid. Please check your input.
errors.internal_server_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkEmailDescription: If an account exists with that email, we've sent you a link to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset. You can now sign in with your new password.

campusNotFound.title: Campus not found
campusNotFound.description: The campus "{{slug}}" does not exist or has been disabled.
campusNotFound.hint: Make sure the address is correct or contact the campus administrator.

hero.title: Create your AI-powered online academy
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform for creators, businesses, and organizations looking to transform knowledge into impact.

features.title: Everything you need to teach online
features.subtitle: Powerful and easy-to-use tools to create, manage, and scale your online academy.

courses.title: Create courses easily
courses.description: Intuitive editor to create modules, lessons, and assessments. Upload videos, documents, and interactive content without hassle.

enterprise.title: For businesses
enterprise.description: Scalable internal training. Manage teams, assign courses, and measure your collaborators' progress.

ai.title: Integrated AI agent
ai.description: An intelligent assistant that knows your content and your students. Answers questions and guides learning 24/7.

whatsapp.title: Connect with WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Your AI agent can communicate with your students directly via WhatsApp. Automated notifications, reminders, and support.

customization.title: Customize your brand
customization.description: Your academy, your style. Customize colors, logos, custom domain, and every detail of your students' experience.

community.title: Integrated community
community.description: Discussion forums, study groups, and networking among students. Build an active community around your content.

aiSection.title: Your AI assistant that knows your students
aiSection.description: Create a personalized agent that understands your content, knows each student's progress, and can connect directly with WhatsApp to provide automated support.

knowledge.title: Knows your content
knowledge.description: The agent learns from your courses, materials, and documents to give accurate answers.

personality.title: Unique personality
personality.description: Configure how your agent speaks: tone, style, and personality that reflects your brand.

instant.title: Instant responses
instant.description: Available 24/7 to answer your students' questions in real time.

chat.title: LearnPress Assistant
chat.userMessage1: Hi, I have a question about module 3
chat.botMessage1: Sure, I'd be happy to help. Module 3 covers React fundamentals. What specific part are you confused about?
chat.botMessage2: Hooks are functions that let you use state and other React features. useState is the most basic one for managing local state.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs. All include a 14-day free trial.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of creators and businesses trust LearnPress for their online academies.

items.content: LearnPress completely transformed our internal training. The AI agent answers employee questions 24/7.
items.author: Maria Garcia

items.content: The WhatsApp integration was a game-changer. My students get reminders and can ask questions without leaving the app.
items.author: Carlos Rodriguez

items.content: I migrated my academy from another platform in a week. The support was exceptional and my students' experience improved significantly.
items.author: Ana Martinez

items.content: As a company, we needed a scalable solution. LearnPress allows us to manage over 5,000 employees without issues.
items.author: David Lopez

items.content: The brand customization is incredible. My academy looks exactly how I imagined it, with my domain and colors.
items.author: Laura Sanchez

items.content: The AI agent knows all my content. It's like having an assistant that never sleeps and always has the right answer.
items.author: Pedro Fernandez

cta.title: Start creating your academy today
cta.description: Join thousands of creators and businesses already transforming knowledge into impact. 14-day free trial.

footer.description: The all-in-one platform for creating AI-powered online academies.
